page.title: 18THREE WEEKS IN BUNGAY
page.content: 7.6.85 former Bungay schoolboy promoted within Birmingham police force/4 Black Dog runners travel to Ipswich for 4 mile road race.14.6.85 farewell to Elsie Turner retires after 15 years at Chaucer Printing Works/Bungay Community Centre holds action for CT Scanner Appeal/17.6.85 Boy dives into River Waveney,now paralysed from neck down.21.6.85 100 people walk round Bungay for paralysed boy's family/one woman clean - up campaign,aimed at local dog owners,gains momentum/school field fouling fears as people exercise dogs on Bungay Middle School grounds/Snooker facilities planned at old Wrightpart warehouse/Taxi-driver George Ling is Bungay's first driver of the year/Butter Cross litter bins getting battered/Rain affects sewage.
